properties.Observation: There are no boundaries and no large trees and two wells have been built.(1.2m x 1.2m x 1.2m and 1.8m x 1.2m)  Water leaks from them. Spring water is taken through a 4" PVC pipe and filled the wells. This is used as a public well.
properties.Description: Construction of curtain wall (0.075mm thk) with 1:2:4 (3/4") concrete, 1/2" dowels at 600mm x 600mm intervals and embedded with chicken mesh/Plaster 12mm thick in 1:3 cement and sand finished smooth with gray cement floating/Vegetative cover improving around structures (5m x 10m) with planting Arecanut seedling in 1.5m x 1.5m grid, and planting Kumbuk/ Mee/ Godapara/ Kaduru/ Aththikka/ Wal Del/ Kekuna/ randomly mixed seedlings in 3.5m x 3.5 m grid/Miscellaneous/Contingancies 10%

properties.Observation: There are no boundaries and no large trees and three wells have been built. Water leaks from them.  (1st well L=4m, W=2.5m, H=2m / 2nd well L=3.5m, W=3.5m, H=1m / 3rd well r=0.45m, H=3m). Previously, the Pradeshiya Sabha had been responsible for water distribution, but currently no proper maintenance.
properties.Description: Plaster 12mm thick in 1:3 cement and sand finished smooth with gray cement floating/Construction of curtain wall (0.075mm thk) with 1:2:4 (3/4") concrete, 1/2" dowels at 600mm x 600mm intervals and embedded with chicken mesh/Vegetative cover improving around structures (5m x 10m) with planting Arecanut seedling in 1.5m x 1.5m grid, and planting Kumbuk/ Mee/ Godapara/ Kaduru/ Aththikka/ Wal Del/ Kekuna/ randomly mixed seedlings in 3.5m x 3.5 m grid/Miscellaneous/Contingancies 10%

properties.Name of Spring and place: Spring near the Wariyagala Sri Muththumari Amman Kovil
properties.Observation: Located in the Hanthana reserve. Water from water springs and a canal leading from the water springs is collected in a catchpit and distributed trough a stock tank. The catchpit has no cover and the boundaries are not marked.
properties.Description: Vegetative cover improving around structures (5m x 10m) with planting Arecanut seedling in 1.5m x 1.5m grid, and planting Kumbuk/ Mee/ Godapara/ Kaduru/ Aththikka/ Wal Del/ Kekuna/ randomly mixed seedlings in 3.5m x 3.5 m grid/Providing a protection net for catch pit/Miscellaneous/Contingancies 10%

properties.Name of Spring and place: Spring at Mrs. P.A. Premawathi's land in Belin Janapadaya
properties.Observation: On a small plot of land, a 3m deep well has been constructed using 900mm dia. Concrete rings. Villagers say that the water here scarce during the dry season. Villagers have become helpless due to water shortage.
properties.Description: Water Pump 2" dia ( Without operator)/Earth excavation for foundation or quarry materials and haul the surplus materials up to 30m by Manually./Construction of Concrete water storage tank of 20 cum - size internal t 3mx3mx2.5/Establishing a water filtering system/Miscellaneous/Contingancies 10%

properties.Observation: A dam (L=6m, H=0.6m) is built across the Haloya canal and the water collected in it is sent to a stock tanks(L=0.4m, W=2.4m, H=1.8m), where the water distributed. There are filtration system and no boundaries.
properties.Description: Fabricating & fixing security weld mesh in open-type buildings in GI weld mesh 50mm x 50mm SWG 10, welded on 40mm x 40mm x 5mm angle frame complete with application of two coats enamel paint over two coats of anticorrosive paint and complete.All as per detail drawing No.CPC/CS/11/04/2017/TYPE-ST/07/Establishing a water filtering system/Vegetative cover improving around structures (5m x 10m) with planting Arecanut seedling in 1.5m x 1.5m grid, and planting Kumbuk/ Mee/ Godapara/ Kaduru/ Aththikka/ Wal Del/ Kekuna/ randomly mixed seedlings in 3.5m x 3.5 m grid/Miscellaneous/Contingancies 10%

properties.Observation: Water is drown from the watagoda main canal and distributed through a stock tank (Stock tank N-7.211897, E-80.622333). There are filtration system and no boundaries.

properties.Observation: Located on Wariyagala GND. Water is drown from the Wariyagala canal and distributed.  There are no boundaries. The plumbing system is dilapidated. (Stock tanks and filtration system Location- N-7.205521, E-80.637339)
properties.Description: Vegetative cover improving around structures (5m x 10m) with planting Arecanut seedling in 1.5m x 1.5m grid, and planting Kumbuk/ Mee/ Godapara/ Kaduru/ Aththikka/ Wal Del/ Kekuna/ randomly mixed seedlings in 3.5m x 3.5 m grid/Construction of a maintenance room (8'x6')/Miscellaneous/Contingancies 10%

properties.Name of Spring and place: Water source at the Kurusa Handiya
properties.Observation: Water is drown from the Nillamba tank pita ela canal and distributed.  There are no boundaries.  (Stock tanks and filtration system Location- N-7.198579, E-80.644651). The water filtration system is not working properly.
